item.title: FireFox OS for Dummies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mozilla’s FireFox OS is the next up and coming operating system for smartphones ?ldquo; its ultra-low hardware requirements allow it to be used to create ultra-low-end handsets for developing markets. ZTE sold 100k units of the Open, and plans a significantly higher amount of devices for the successor.However, developing for FFOS is a bit weird […]
item.content:encoded: Mozilla’s FireFox OS is the next up and coming operating system for smartphones ?ldquo; its ultra-low hardware requirements allow it to be used to create ultra-low-end handsets for developing markets. ZTE sold 100k units of the Open, and plans a significantly higher amount of devices for the successor.However, developing for FFOS is a bit weird as there is no real framework involved. Tamoggemon Holding k.s. has ported a few of its applications to the new operating system ?ldquo; this talk would show developers how to create FireFox OS applications efficiently and which pitfalls should best be avoided.
